prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: William Jordan, Manumission Bond, 9 March 1810. Accession 41329, Personal Papers Collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Bond, 9 March 1810, issued to William Jordan of Isle of Wight County, Virginia, and William T. Muse and William Spence of Pasquotank County, North Carolina, for the manumission of a slave named Tom. Filed in Pasquatank County, North Carolina.
